channel.title: Run.bat/Complier Error
channel.description:
OK well I'm having a problem. My complier is saying no path specified which is retarted, cause I changed the variables/complier code so it supports the 20th patch. My run.bat closes out once I run it too.
Can anyone tell me what's wrong?
Complier Code [code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/code]
Runserver.bat Code
[code]@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title EvolutionX RunServer java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.20-ga-bin.jar server cls[/code]

item.title: Run.bat/Complier Error
item.dc:creator: @rockyd2 rockyd2
item.description:
@rockyd2 wrote:

OK well I’m having a problem. My complier is saying no path specified which is retarted, cause I changed the variables/complier code so it supports the 20th patch. My run.bat closes out once I run it too.

Can anyone tell me what’s wrong?

Complier Code

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Runserver.bat Code

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title EvolutionX RunServer java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.20-ga-bin.jar server cls

Read full topic
